name: Scarecrow Harvester
description: The Scarecrow Harvester is a humanoid construct made to instill fear, with a mix of plant-like and skeletal features. Its claws are sharp, and it can create chaos on the battlefield with its abilities.
memorable: Unique ability to throw its head and become invisible, creating tactical disruptions.
goals: To instill fear among foes and control the battlefield.
relations: Related to other constructs, especially those tied to nature or farming.
environment: Found in rural areas or farmland, typically among crops.
strengths: High Dexterity aids in evasion, possesses fear-based abilities, and has significant resistances.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage; can be dispelled easily.
attacks: Claw attacks dealing slashing and necrotic damage, as well as fear-inducing abilities.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath allows it to deal area damage and restrict enemy movement.
senses: It has darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive perception of 12.
skills: It has a keen ability to intimidate and control foes with its fear effects.
additional_information: Immune to poison and several conditions.
Can reanimate after being dispelled unless destroyed.
Flammable trait creates tactical options both for itself and adversaries.
Invisibility can be used for ambushes or escape.

mechanical monster with fear abilities and fire breath
tactical scarecrow with necrotic claw attacks
